auth.headline: Next-Gen <1>Multi-Agent Collaboration</1> Space
auth.description: Transform every conversation into an intelligent workspace. Integrate long-term memory and private knowledge base to make AI your capable partner in life and work.
auth.registerSubtitle: Register to connect to Parallax collaboration network
auth.loginSubtitle: Login to connect your agent workspace

validation.fixErrors: Please fix the errors in the form
validation.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address

messages.emailTaken: Email already registered, please login or use another email
messages.invalidRegister: Registration info incomplete or password too short

memory.title: Personal Memory Bank
memory.desc: RAG-powered private knowledge engine that deeply understands your documents, notes, and conversation history.

privacy.title: Edge Privacy Computing
privacy.desc: Data processed on local edge nodes, achieving trusted distributed inference through Parallax protocol.

intent.title: Intent-Driven Collaboration
intent.desc: LLM intent recognition engine enabling paradigm shift from 'passive response' to 'proactive collaboration'.

layout.offlineWarning: You are currently offline. Changes may not be saved.

sidebar.confirmRemoveUser: Are you sure you want to remove this user?

chat.textFilesOnly: Only text files and documents supported
chat.noTextFromHtml: No valid text content extracted from HTML file

settings.title: Settings
settings.subtitle: Configure AI interface address, model, and API Key
settings.loadFailed: Failed to load config, please try again.
settings.saveFailed: Failed to save config, please try again.
settings.apiKeyHint: OpenAI/Anthropic/Azure required | Ollama/Parallax can use 'not-needed' or leave empty
settings.securityNote: Config will be stored securely and used for summary generation.

agent.configSubtitle: Configure available LLM Agents in the room, with custom models, capabilities and runtime.
agent.noAgents: No Agents yet, click "New" to create one.
agent.name: Name
agent.modelEndpointHint: API address of the model service (custom or third-party)
agent.apiKeyOptional: Local models (Ollama) or self-hosted services can use 'not-needed' or leave empty
agent.capabilitiesHint: Enabling capabilities will automatically enable required tools
agent.generalToolsHint: Independently enabled tools, available for all modes
agent.mcpHint: Connect to MCP server to use external tools (e.g., GitHub, databases)
agent.proactiveCooldownHint: Minimum interval for Agent to interject or react
agent.maxToolRoundsHint: Maximum tool call rounds per response (default 3)

capabilities.title: Capabilities
capabilities.activeInterjectDesc: Proactively participate in conversations (may reply even when not @mentioned)
capabilities.emojiReactionDesc: Add emoji reactions to messages (can be combined with passive/active mode)

tools.title: Tools
tools.getContextDesc: Get 10 messages around a specific message
tools.getLongContextDesc: Get full conversation history for deep understanding
tools.webSearchDesc: Search the web for real-time information
tools.knowledgeBaseDesc: Retrieve relevant information from uploaded documents

mode.hybridDesc: Supports both passive reply and proactive participation
mode.proactiveDesc: Autonomously decides whether to participate in conversation

reasoning.title: Reasoning Level
reasoning.hint: GPT-OSS Harmony format reasoning depth: Low for fast response, High for deep analysis

mcp.connectedNoTools: Connected, but server provides no tools
mcp.connectedSuccess: Connected to MCP server ({{transport}}), found {{count}} tools

form.defaultDesc: Fill in basic info to create a custom Agent.

about.title: Multi-Agent Collaboration Space
about.subtitle: Next-gen LLM group chat workspace built on Parallax

edge.title: Edge Orchestration
edge.desc: Dynamic scheduling of multi-modal Agent toolchains based on Gradient Parallax edge computing network

privacy.title: Edge Privacy Computing
privacy.desc: Data processed on local edge nodes, achieving trusted distributed inference through Parallax protocol

intent.title: Intent-Driven Collaboration
intent.desc: LLM intent recognition engine enabling paradigm shift from 'passive response' to 'proactive collaboration'
